string-array.name: lorem_ipsum_short
string-array.item: Nothing is so common as wish to be remarkable
Congrats to Wings Gaming for winning Ti6 Champion .

string-array.name: lorem_ipsum_long
string-array.item: I am an international student from Sichuan China. I came to Japan to pursuing my own dream two years ago, now I studying at the University of Tsukuba.I love traveling and communicate with people from allover the world. Exchanging ideas with people from different cultures always makes me full of passion and excited.
I am an international student from Sichuan China. I came to Japan for further education at the year of 2014. Im a basketball and DotA fan.All I wanna to say is 一起哈啤!

I am an international student from Jiangsu China. I am very optimistic and generous. My hobbies are pingpong and swimming. Hope you can do with me! In the rest time I will do my best to make a progress and be better and better!
I am an international student from Nanjing China. I came to Japan to two years ago, now I studying at the University of TsuKuba.
Hi, I came from Ehime University. This is the first time to visit University of Tsukuba. Im busy with enPiT now!
I am a student of Ehime University. I am working in team Mintia of enPiT at University of Tsukuba. Hope this application can make your trips more convenient. \n\nWE LOVE TRAVELING!
